response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its value to you, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while securing your satisfaction with our product. We believe this investment will pay off in terms of both functionality and peace of mind. Should you choose to proceed, please let us know, and we'll arrange for immediate delivery. Looking forward to serving you, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
